reviews.text: Platform 1 smells fried chicken no matter how deep you walk along the platform. There seems to be a takeaway nearby. Also, it's poorly serviced with rubbish and dirt left on the benches and of course no operator announcements or updates!

Arrogance and bad attitude from staff exists here even having to change here from London..especially from one young lad who's a snotty ignorant idiot by the gates. No wonder why the reviews are already torrid on here

I liked it here but the gap between the train and the platform is pretty big (that is dangerous for little children and buggies)
If you work for South Western Railway please lower the gap between the train and the platform at Raynes Park
Thank you and I hope you enjoy my review

Well served local station 
have know this station since 1988 yetv
Sadly still  no lift to / from platforms 
which you would have though by now would have been long ago installed especially connecting platforms 3-4. 
NOT THE BEST WAY TO GET ABOUT FOR THOSES OF US WHO ARE HANDICAPPED 
Small cafe on the up line platform towards Wimbledon offering food and drinks a small blessing.
